title: Acknowledgement and Consent
body:
ACKNOWLEDGEMENT AND CONSENT

To: {{parties.name}}
{{parties.address}}
{{parties.city_state_postcode}}

title: Acknowledgement Introduction
body: I, {{participant.name}}, acknowledge that Swinburne University of Technology ("Swinburne") wishes to use the materials listed below, developed by a team of Swinburne students in the context of their final year project titled:

I acknowledge that the team of Swinburne students has discussed the contents of these materials with me, and I give consent that the materials developed can be:

(Please tick where appropriate)

title: CAPEX Usage
body: [CHECKBOX] Shown at the 2025 Capstone Project Exposition (CAPEX25) to be held on campus on {{event.date}} by the School of Science, Computing and Engineering Technologies

title: Promotional Usage
body: [CHECKBOX] Used to assist the promotion of Swinburne University of Technology, the School of Science, Computing and Engineering Technologies at Swinburne, and relevant programs.

title: Materials List
body:
Materials:
Expo Poster
Project description ("elevator pitch")

title: Signature Block
Return Instructions
body: Note: After signing, this document should be returned to {{coordinator.name}} (The Capstone Project Coordinator) at Swinburne University of Technology via email: {{coordinator.email}}

title: Footer
body: Swinburne University of Technology | CRICOS Provider 00111D | swinburne.edu.au
